name: Cytris Inc.
description:
(Fullscreen required for UI on web build!)

A cyberpunk dystopian Tetris/platformer hybrid! Reach the top to win!

Use WASD to move, Space to jump

Arrow keys to move blocks, and Shift or R to rotate blocks!

If you find yourself blocked in, press Q to respawn - at the cost of some health.

Reach the top to win!

Kill Snoombas (roomba snails) by jumping on them or crushing them with blocks.




Credits:
